channel.title: 317 help with my computer!
channel.description: i have a 317 client and source and it works fine but the client keeps closing on me everytime i click something and i have a 64bit computer. When i right click and click edit on the client this is what it says @echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

item.title: 317 help with my computer!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Use this

@echo off COLOR 04 title 64 bit "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaW.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help with my computer!
item.dc:creator: @ironguy7 ironguy7
item.description:
@ironguy7 wrote:

i have a 317 client and source and it works fine but the client keeps closing on me everytime i click something and i have a 64bit computer. When i right click and click edit on the client this is what it says
@echo off
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Read full topic
